name: Battle Strike

dc_chart.effect: +1 attack, +1d6 damage
+1 attack, +2d6 damage
+1 attack, +3d6 damage

force_point_effect: Add +2d6 damage to your next attack

name: Dark Rage

dc_chart.effect: +2 melee attack and damage until end of turn
+4 melee attack and damage until end of turn
+6 melee attack and damage until end of turn

force_point_effect: Extend rage duration until end of encounter

name: Farseeing

dc_chart.effect: Sense life status, surroundings, emotions

force_point_effect: Gain clear mental image of surroundings and nearby creatures

name: Force Disarm

dc_chart.effect: Disarm target, weapon drops or flies to your hand

force_point_effect: Damage weapon equal to Use the Force check result

name: Force Grip

dc_chart.effect: 2d6 damage, target limited to swift action
4d6 damage, target limited to swift action
6d6 damage, target limited to swift action

force_point_effect: Add +2d6 damage

name: Force Lightning

dc_chart.effect: 8d6 damage, -1 condition step
4d6 damage, no condition change

force_point_effect: Move target an additional -1 step on condition track

name: Force Slam

dc_chart.effect: 4d6 damage, knocked prone
2d6 damage, not prone

force_point_effect: Add +2d6 damage

name: Force Stun

dc_chart.effect: -1 condition step
-2 condition steps
-3 condition steps

force_point_effect: Move target an additional -1 step on condition track

name: Force Thrust
check_type: Use the Force vs. Strength check

dc_chart.effect: Push 1 square +1 per 5 over; 1d6 damage if hitting object

force_point_effect: Apply -5 penalty to target's Strength check and +2d6 damage on impact

name: Move Object

dc_chart.effect: Move Medium object, 2d6 damage
Move Large object, 4d6 damage
Move Huge object, 6d6 damage
Move Gargantuan object, 8d6 damage
Move Colossal object, 10d6 damage

force_point_effect: Increase size by one category and add +2d6 damage

name: Rebuke

dc_chart.effect: Negate power and reflect it back on attacker

force_point_effect: Gain +5 bonus to your Use the Force check

name: Search Your Feelings

dc_chart.effect: Sense if a specific action will lead to good or bad outcome within 24 hours

force_point_effect: Gain clearer insight or additional detail

name: Sever Force

dc_chart.effect: Target loses Force powers and Force Point access for 24 hours

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 1 week

name: Surge

dc_chart.effect: +10 speed, +5 Jump checks until end of turn
+10 speed, +10 Jump checks until end of turn
+10 speed, +15 Jump checks until end of turn

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 1 minute

name: Vital Transfer

dc_chart.effect: Heal target 1/2 your level in hit points; you take same amount as damage
Heal target equal to your level; you take half that as damage
Heal target 2× your level; you take 1/4 that as damage

force_point_effect: You take no damage from transfer

name: Mind Trick

dc_chart.effect: Target believes a simple lie or suggestion

force_point_effect: Target suffers -5 penalty to Will Defense against this power

name: Negate Energy

dc_chart.effect: Negate energy damage from one attack

force_point_effect: Redirect energy back at attacker (same damage)

name: Force Shield

dc_chart.effect: +5 to Reflex Defense until start of next turn
+10 to Reflex Defense until start of next turn
+15 to Reflex Defense until start of next turn

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 1 minute

name: Force Valor

dc_chart.effect: +1 to attack rolls, skill checks, and all defenses for 1 minute
+2 to same bonuses
+3 to same bonuses

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 10 minutes

name: Force Cloak

dc_chart.effect: Gain concealment until end of turn
Gain total concealment until end of turn
Gain total concealment and +5 Stealth until end of turn

force_point_effect: Extend concealment duration to 1 minute

name: Force Blast

dc_chart.effect: 6d6 damage, pushed 1 square
3d6 damage, no push

force_point_effect: Push targets an additional square and add +2d6 damage

name: Force Storm

dc_chart.effect: 8d6 electricity damage, -1 condition step
4d6 electricity damage

force_point_effect: Move targets an additional -1 step on condition track

name: Force Scream

dc_chart.effect: 6d6 sonic damage, -1 condition step
3d6 sonic damage

force_point_effect: Push targets back 1 square and add +2d6 damage

name: Force Sight

dc_chart.effect: Ignore concealment and cover from Force-sensitive targets for 1 round
Same effect for 1 minute
Same effect for 10 minutes

force_point_effect: Gain blindsight 6 squares for duration

name: Force Track

dc_chart.effect: Sense direction and distance to target

force_point_effect: Gain insight into target’s emotional state or surroundings

name: Force Weapon

dc_chart.effect: +1d6 damage until end of turn
+2d6 damage until end of turn
+3d6 damage until end of turn

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 1 minute

name: Kinetic Combat

dc_chart.effect: +1 to attack rolls until end of turn
+2 to attack rolls until end of turn
+3 to attack rolls until end of turn

force_point_effect: Extend duration to 1 minute

name: Malacia

dc_chart.effect: Target is nauseated for 1 round

force_point_effect: Extend nausea duration to 1 minute
